title: Netanyahu Wants a Never-Go-to-Jail Card
description: His case for clemency rests on the assumption that he’s irreplaceable.
content: Presidential pardons are in fashion in the United States, even for people who haven’t yet been found guilty of a crime. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is a well-known Americanophile. Now h… [+9195 chars]
